email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily Carter,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 12,500MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai on CIF terms. The vessel proposed is MV SEA HORIZON, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 220m.

Our initial freight quote is USD 28.50 per metric ton. The laycan is set for November 15 to November 20, with a loading window of 48 hours.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 27.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and any additional charges?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. After reviewing the market conditions, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 27.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day, applicable only if there is a delay beyond the agreed laydays.

The laycan remains November 15 to November 20, with a 48-hour loading window. Please let us know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 27.50 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment Agreement: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Newcastle on November 15, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment Agreement: MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers
